title: New B.U. Women’s Basketball Coach, Mary Grimes, talks with News 34 Sports
content: BINGHAMTON, N.Y. (WIVT/WBGH) – The Binghamton University Women’s Basketball team has a new leader this year.
Mary Grimes was named the program’s Head Coach back in April.
On Monday, Coach Grimes visited News 34 to talk with Sports Director, Brian Rudman, about the new era of Binghamton University Women’s Basketball.
Watch the interview as seen on News 34 above and the full-length interview below!
